title: Bug 47910: ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF
description: The output .jar file created using 'ajc sourceroots <mydir outjar <my.jar' does not include a MANIFEST.MF file.
OB: When I use the ajc command with the sourceroots option and specify an output file with a .jar extension, a file is created but it does not contain a MANIFEST.MF file.
EB: The output .jar file should include a valid MANIFEST.MF file.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Open the command prompt
2. Run the 'ajc' command with 'sourceroots <mydir outjar <my.jar' option
3. Check the output .jar file and verify if it contains a MANIFEST.MF file.
